Articles.Content:
What about the abilities to dump fuel from tanks(not transfer dump) and the ability to take in water through intakes into empty fuel tanks and pump water out of those tanks for buoyancy. I could do all sorts of fun things with this in my ssto's I can water land and with buoyancy get underwater without adding extra unwanted fins on the bottom.

Edited October 20, 2016 by Arugela

Certainly I think fuel dumping is something that should be possible on Jet/plane parts.

As for the water, its a cool idea but the water system (if there will be one) is not really implemented right now, so I think any changes to the way water works would come with that update.

Still neat ideas though!
